Rhinox/Sniper


Rhinox sees all the bullets coming. he fires all the bullets he can 
then runs into the base yelling "Sniper, The Predacons are outside
and 
attacking." Rhinox runs to the wepon room and grabs a rocket launcher 
and a rifle. He grabs some ammo.

Sniper heard some yelling and check the Scanners. "Oaky, why is the 
screen Red, Red means Predacon!" Sniper runs over to the com station. 
"Every Slagging Maximal get to base we are under attack and 
outnumbered by about 5 to 1."
